instructions:
Sheet Version 4.0
This is a major rewrite of the sheet in every way.
See [the Wiki Page](https://wiki.roll20.net/Torg_Eternity_Community_Sheet) for a full description of the new sheet.

options: Display Popup to ask for Last Roll|0
Tokens must be selected, gets Last Roll automatically|1
useroptions.description: Check to use selected Tokens for rolls; leave unchecked to get a Popup asking for Last Roll.

options: Display Total Damage, let users calculate Wounds and Shock|0
Ask for Toughness, and Display Wounds and Shock|1
Select Target Tokens, and Display Wounds and Shock|2
useroptions.description: How damage rolls will display their results.
